archive-settings.name: clear_archive_after_days
archive-settings.description: Clears the archive after a set amount of days. Set to '0' to never clear. (DEFAULT=7)

archive-settings.name: archive_GPU
archive-settings.description: Decide whether or not to save GPU data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive-settings.name: archive_CPU
archive-settings.description: Decide whether or not to save CPU data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive-settings.name: archive_RAM
archive-settings.description: Decide whether or not to save RAM data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

archive-settings.name: archive_DISK
archive-settings.description: Decide whether or not to save DISK data to the archive. (DEFAULT=TRUE)

metrics-settings.name: interval
metrics-settings.description: The frequency of when data points are recorded and stored in the archive. WARNING: Do not go below 0.1 (DEFAULT=1)
